content: metaphysics thinks/represents beings as (only) beings, owes this sight to the light of Being > this light itself, what metaphysics sees as light, no longer w/in range of metaphysics
linkedContent: metaphysics thinks/represents beings as (only) beings, owes this sight to the light of Being > this light itself, what metaphysics sees as light, no longer w/in range of metaphysics

content: thinking that sets out to experience ground of metaphysics, attempt to recall truth of Being > [totally other, beyond Being] from point of view of metaphysics ground appears as ground [cf. 279n Being as nonground (Nichtgrund), X ground], presumably something else experienced in its own terms, something as yet unsaid, something other than metaphysics

content: truth of Being called ground, that which nourishes root of tree of philosophy (i.e. metaphysics) > in the ground, roots forget themselves for sake of tree > philosophy doesn’t gather itself upon its ground, always leaves (never escapes) its ground, by means of metaphysics

content: as long as man understands himself as rational animal, metaphysics belongs (as Kant says) to nature of man

content: why overcoming of metaphysics [Destruction] is necessary?
linkedContent: why overcoming of metaphysics [Destruction] is necessary?

content: at stake: attentiveness (Achten) to arrival (Ankunft) of hitherto unspoken essence of unconcealedness Being has announced (angekündigt) itself to be [cf. 280n X Being, also Being, truth, world, Ereignis] [multiple names]
linkedContent: at stake: attentiveness (Achten) to arrival (Ankunft) of hitherto unspoken essence of unconcealedness Being has announced (angekündigt) itself to be [cf. 280n X Being, also Being, truth, world, Ereignis] [multiple names]

content: metaphysics as barrier that refuses human beings primordial relation (anfänglichen Bezug) of Being to the human essence [cf. 281n X Being]
linkedContent: metaphysics as barrier that refuses human beings primordial relation (anfänglichen Bezug) of Being to the human essence [cf. 281n X Being]

content: overcoming of metaphysics [Destruction] corresponded to endeavor to first learn to attend to oblivion of Being, to experience this oblivion, absorb this experience into relation of Being to man, preserve (verwahren) it there [ontological difference & Being] > in the need (Not) belonging to oblivion of Being, question: “What is metaphysics?” perhaps most necessary for thought > [Destruction] representational thought relinquished to thinking brought to pass (ereignetes) by Being itself, in thrall to Being (um dem Sein höriges Denken) [MOP, telos]: more thoughtful our thinking becomes, more purely our thinking will stand of its own accord in sole action appropriate to it [attention to Being]
linkedContent: overcoming of metaphysics [Destruction] corresponded to endeavor to first learn to attend to oblivion of Being, to experience this oblivion, absorb this experience into relation of Being to man, preserve (verwahren) it there [ontological difference & Being] > in the need (Not) belonging to oblivion of Being, question: “What is metaphysics?” perhaps most necessary for thought > [Destruction] representational thought relinquished to thinking brought to pass (ereignetes) by Being itself, in thrall to Being (um dem Sein höriges Denken) [MOP, telos]: more thoughtful our thinking becomes, more purely our thinking will stand of its own accord in sole action appropriate to it [attention to Being]

content: thinking attempted in Being and Time is “under way (unterwegs)” toward bringing thinking onto a way, toward opening a path for thinking [not there yet, telos, preparatory, provisional] > how could this conjecture (experienced here [really???]), that relation of Being to human essence belongs to Being itself, become explicit before every attempt to liberate Dasein from subjectivity, etc. [had to go through destruction via meaning of Being to think truth of Being]

motif.title: PREORGINARY SYNTHESIS [Derrida bringing together instead of dividing?]

content: Dasein names that which is 1st of all to be experienced, subsequently thought accordingly as a place (Stelle), locality (Ortschaft) of truth of Being
linkedContent: Dasein names that which is 1st of all to be experienced, subsequently thought accordingly as a place (Stelle), locality (Ortschaft) of truth of Being

content: truth of Being does not exhaust itself in Dasein [excess, surplus]

motif.title: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY

linkedContent: truth of Being does not exhaust itself in Dasein [excess, surplus]

content: [standing in that which folds you out] [great summary of existence of Dasein] withstanding (Ausstehen), as care, essence of ecstasis to be thought here, a “standing out” where “out” should be understood in terms of the “outside itself” of openness of Being itself > stasis of the ecstatic (as strange as it sounds): standing in the “out” and “there” of unconcealedness, prevails as essence of Being itself > replace “existence” w/ “in-standing (Inständigkeit)”

content: being that exists is the human being, not rocks, not horse, not trees, not angels, not God [Being does not exist?] [cf. 284n X Being]

content: Selbstbewusstsein, consciousness, Sein in consciousness
linkedContent: Selbstbewusstsein, consciousness, Sein in consciousness

content: “time” as preliminary name (Vorname) for truth of Being, truth is what prevails as essential in Being, is Being itself
linkedContent: “time” as preliminary name (Vorname) for truth of Being, truth is what prevails as essential in Being, is Being itself

content: if we adhere to customary usage (of words for Being: einai, esse) betray ourselves as pacemakers (Schrittmacher) of greatest thoughtlessness to have gained currency in human thought, has remained dominant until this moment > essence of presencing deeply concealed in early names for Being
linkedContent: if we adhere to customary usage (of words for Being: einai, esse) betray ourselves as pacemakers (Schrittmacher) of greatest thoughtlessness to have gained currency in human thought, has remained dominant until this moment > essence of presencing deeply concealed in early names for Being

content: via time as preliminary name Being is unconcealed, concealed essence of time speaks in first metaphysical names for Being & in its last name: “eternal recurrence of the same” [EROS] [is Being a metaphysical name for Being?]

motif.name: DERRIDA CONFESSES, SUMMARIZES in "Punctuations: the Time of a Thesis"

content: “understanding”: relation that tries to enter into relation of truth of Being to human essence, ecstatic, thrown projection, standing in realm of the open > realm that opens for us in projection is called meaning > “Meaning of Being” says same as “truth of Being” [not identical?]

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

content: time belongs to truth of Being in a way still concealed > every holding open of truth of Being must look toward time as possible horizon of an understanding of Being [not there yet, telos] > time as provisional goal in Being and Time ——[nice, clever] proof of oblivion of Being, the reception of Being and Time ——ontotheology (first philosophy, philosophy proper) as twofold: truth of beings in their universality & in highest being

content: Greek already ontotheological > metaphysics always has twofold character, but closed off to reason/origin of twofold, it is what it is: representation of beings as beings > metaphysics has no choice: metaphysics by its very essence excluded from experience of Being
linkedContent: Greek already ontotheological > metaphysics always has twofold character, but closed off to reason/origin of twofold, it is what it is: representation of beings as beings > metaphysics has no choice: metaphysics by its very essence excluded from experience of Being

content: fundamental ontology (attempt to inquire back), like any title, soon seen to be inappropriate [beyond Being then?], misleading because says something correct from point of view of metaphysics > what matters is undertaking transition [not there yet] from metaphysics to recalling truth of Being > thinking that calls itself “fundamental ontology” blocks/obscures its own path by very designation > attempt to recall truth of Being, going back into ground of metaphysics [Destruction], already left realm of all ontology w/ 1st step [was that step ever taken?] > wherever indirect/direct representation of “transcendence” remains: ontology [cf. On The Essence of Ground p. 125] [cf. OG pp. 22-3]

content: for a preliminary orientation, nothing more necessary than question: “What is metaphysics?”
linkedContent: for a preliminary orientation, nothing more necessary than question: “What is metaphysics?”

content: Nothing understood as Being itself > Heidegger reframes fundamental question of metaphysics: “how does it come about that with Being It [cf. 290n For metaphysics] is really nothing and that the Nothing does not properly prevail?” [i.e. how does metaphysics forget Being as Nothing?]
linkedContent: Nothing understood as Being itself > Heidegger reframes fundamental question of metaphysics: “how does it come about that with Being It [cf. 290n For metaphysics] is really nothing and that the Nothing does not properly prevail?” [i.e. how does metaphysics forget Being as Nothing?]
